title: Cerros San Cristobal
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Mexican, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A hill-top restaurant, with a 180 degree panoramic view, can be reached by free shuttle from Antigua. All dishes prepared from organic produce from the garden. As of September 2015, has 2 vegan dishes (a salad and a pasta dish) and tomato juice.
